text: Moominiiney isin munaafiqhiinik aka maray siinik amaan geyaah sinni marak Amaan geyam faxa mara geetton, usun koros kee koroosannûů fanah gacsiminnaanih waqdi uma gacimih kaat gacan, ama mari Qeebik xabanah Siinik gaceweeh gaba Aceeweeh sinni gaboobi sin Qeebik Abbixe week, Toysa Seewah ken Abbixaay ken elle geyinnaanih Aracal ken Qida, too mara kinni Qiddaanaah Seewah ken orbissaanamah Baxxaqqa iyya Sumaq Siinih kak abnem
